block.p: Barbara Martinez, the daughter of Laurea Lageyre of Newark and the late Manuel Martinez of Miami Beach, was married yesterday to Jason John Griggs, the son of Rosemary and Roger Griggs of Frankfort, Ill. The Rev. Michael V. Guglielmelli performed the ceremony at St. Francis Roman Catholic Church in Hoboken, N.J.

The bride, 29, is a reporter at The Wall Street Journal, covering the real estate industry. She graduated cum laude from New York University. Ms. Martinez, who will keep her name, is also the secretary of the board of the Dow Jones Newspaper Fund, a foundation that encourages young people to consider careers in journalism. Her mother retired as a draftswoman for Wallace & Tiernan, a maker of water purification systems that was in Belleville, N.J. Her father was an auto mechanic for Central Tire and Auto in Newark.

Barbara Martinez, the daughter of Laurea Lageyre of Newark and the late Manuel Martinez of Miami Beach, was married yesterday to Jason John Griggs, the son of Rosemary and Roger Griggs of Frankfort, Ill. The Rev. Michael V. Guglielmelli performed the ceremony at St. Francis Roman Catholic Church in Hoboken, N.J.

The bride, 29, is a reporter at The Wall Street Journal, covering the real estate industry. She graduated cum laude from New York University. Ms. Martinez, who will keep her name, is also the secretary of the board of the Dow Jones Newspaper Fund, a foundation that encourages young people to consider careers in journalism. Her mother retired as a draftswoman for Wallace & Tiernan, a maker of water purification systems that was in Belleville, N.J. Her father was an auto mechanic for Central Tire and Auto in Newark.

The bridegroom, 28, is an account executive in the Little Falls, N.J., office of Lawson Software. He graduated from Northern Illinois University. His father is an agent in Chicago for the Federal Bureau of Investigation. His mother is a secretary in Tinley Park, Ill.
